00049 void AnaInfo::Init()
00050 {
00051    const char* tmpEnv;
00052 
00053    tmpEnv = getenv("CNIPOL_DIR");
00054 
00055    if (tmpEnv) fAsymEnv["CNIPOL_DIR"] = tmpEnv;
00056    else        fAsymEnv["CNIPOL_DIR"] = ".";
00057 
00058    tmpEnv = getenv("CNIPOL_DATA_DIR");
00059 
00060    if (tmpEnv) fAsymEnv["CNIPOL_DATA_DIR"] = tmpEnv;
00061    else        fAsymEnv["CNIPOL_DATA_DIR"] = ".";
00062 
00063    tmpEnv = getenv("CNIPOL_RESULTS_DIR");
00064 
00065    if (tmpEnv) fAsymEnv["CNIPOL_RESULTS_DIR"] = tmpEnv;
00066    else        fAsymEnv["CNIPOL_RESULTS_DIR"] = ".";
00067 
00068    tmpEnv = getenv("SLOW_CONTROL_LOG_DIR");
00069 
00070    if (tmpEnv) fAsymEnv["SLOW_CONTROL_LOG_DIR"] = tmpEnv;
00071    else        fAsymEnv["SLOW_CONTROL_LOG_DIR"] = "/eicdata/eic0005/cdev_log";
00072 
00073    fUserGroup = *gSystem->GetUserInfo();
00074 }

00076 
00078 void AnaInfo::MakeOutDir()
00079 {
00080    if (GetOutDir().size() > 200) {
00081       Error("MakeOutDir", "Output directory name is too long");
00082    }
00083 
00084    const bool kACCESSABLE = false; // bizarre convention of return value
00085    if (gSystem->AccessPathName(GetOutDir().c_str()) == kACCESSABLE)
00086    {
00087       Warning("MakeOutDir", "Directory %s already exists", GetOutDir().c_str());
00088    }
00089    else if (gSystem->mkdir(GetOutDir().c_str()) < 0)
00090    {
00091       Fatal("MakeOutDir", "Can't create directory %s", GetOutDir().c_str());
00092    }
00093    else
00094    {
00095       Info("MakeOutDir", "Created directory %s", GetOutDir().c_str());
00096       gSystem->Chmod(GetOutDir().c_str(), 0775);
00097    }
00098 }

00101 string AnaInfo::GetSuffix()           const { return !fSuffix.empty() ? "_" + fSuffix : "" ; }
00102 string AnaInfo::GetImageDir()         const { return GetOutDir() + "/images" + GetSuffix(); }
00103 string AnaInfo::GetAnaInfoFileName()  const { return GetOutDir() + "/anainfo" + GetSuffix() + ".php"; }
00104 string AnaInfo::GetStdLogFileName()   const { return GetOutDir() + "/" + fFileStdLogName + GetSuffix() + ".log"; }
00105 string AnaInfo::GetRootFileName()     const { return GetOutDir() + "/" + fOutputName + GetSuffix() + ".root"; }
00106 FILE*  AnaInfo::GetAnaInfoFile()      const { return fFileMeasInfo; }
00107 
00108 Bool_t AnaInfo::HasGraphBit()         const { return (fModes & AnaInfo::MODE_GRAPH) == AnaInfo::MODE_GRAPH; }

00137 void AnaInfo::VerifyOptions()
00138 {
00139    // The run name must be specified
00140    if (fOutputName.empty()) {
00141       Error("VerifyOptions", "Output name must be specified");
00142       PrintUsage();
00143       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00144    }
00145 
00146    MakeOutDir();
00147 
00148    fFileMeasInfo = fopen(this->GetAnaInfoFileName().c_str(), "w");
00149    gSystem->Chmod(this->GetAnaInfoFileName().c_str(), 0775);
00150 
00151    // Set default standard log output
00152    if (!fFileStdLogName.empty()) {
00153       freopen(GetStdLogFileName().c_str(), "w", stdout);
00154       fclose(stderr);
00155       stderr = stdout;
00156       gSystem->Chmod(GetStdLogFileName().c_str(), 0775);
00157    }
00158 }

00168 
00170 void AnaInfo::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00171 {
00172    fprintf(f, "$rc['fOutputName']                  = \"%s\";\n",  fOutputName.c_str());
00173    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAsymVersion']                 = \"%s\";\n",  fAsymVersion.c_str());
00174    fprintf(f, "$rc['fSuffix']                      = \"%s\";\n",  fSuffix.c_str());
00175    fprintf(f, "$rc['fModes']                       = %#010lx;\n", fModes);
00176    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAnaDateTime']                 = %u;\n",      (UInt_t) fAnaDateTime);
00177    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAnaTimeReal']                 = %f;\n",      fAnaTimeReal);
00178    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAnaTimeCpu']                  = %f;\n",      fAnaTimeCpu);
00179 
00180    stringstream ssEnvs("");
00181 
00182    ssEnvs << "array(";
00183 
00184    for (Str2StrMap::const_iterator ienv=fAsymEnv.begin(); ienv!=fAsymEnv.end(); ienv++) {
00185       ssEnvs << "'" << ienv->first << "'"  << " => " << "\"" << ienv->second << "\"";
00186       ssEnvs << (ienv != (--fAsymEnv.end()) ? ", " : "");
00187    }
00188 
00189    ssEnvs << ")";
00190 
00191    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAsymEnv']                     = %s;\n", ssEnvs.str().c_str());
00192    fprintf(f, "$rc['fFileStdLogName']              = \"%s\";\n", fFileStdLogName.c_str());
00193    fprintf(f, "$rc['fFlagCopyResults']             = %d;\n", fFlagCopyResults);
00194    fprintf(f, "$rc['fFlagUseDb']                   = %d;\n", fFlagUseDb);
00195    fprintf(f, "$rc['fFlagUpdateDb']                = %d;\n", fFlagUpdateDb);
00196    fprintf(f, "$rc['fFlagCreateThumbs']            = %d;\n", fFlagCreateThumbs);
00197    fprintf(f, "$rc['fUserGroup_fUser']             = \"%s\";\n", fUserGroup.fUser.Data());
00198    fprintf(f, "$rc['fUserGroup_fRealName']         = \"%s\";\n", fUserGroup.fRealName.Data());
00199 
00200    fprintf(f, "\n");
00201 }

00203 
00205 void AnaInfo::CopyResults()
00206 {
00207    if (!fFlagCopyResults) return;
00208 
00209    string cmd = "rsync --stats --exclude=*.root -rlpgoDv " + GetOutDir() + " pc2pc.phy.bnl.gov:/usr/local/polarim/root/";
00210    Info("CopyResults", "Copying results...\n%s", cmd.c_str());
00211 
00212    char result[1000];
00213    FILE *fp = popen( cmd.c_str(), "r");
00214 
00215    while (fgets(result, sizeof(result), fp) != NULL ) { printf("%s", result); }
00216 
00217    pclose(fp);
00218 }

00222 void AnaInfo::PrintUsage()
00223 {
00224    cout << endl;
00225    cout << "Options:" << endl;
00226    cout << " -h, -?                               : Print this help" << endl;
00227    cout << " -l, --log=[filename]                 : Optional log file to redirect stdout and stderr" << endl;
00228    cout << " -g, --graph                          : Save histograms as images" << endl;
00229    cout << "     --copy                           : Copy results to server (?)" << endl;
00230    cout << "     --use-db                         : Run info will be retrieved from and saved into database" << endl;
00231    cout << "     --update-db                      : Update run info in database" << endl;
00232    cout << endl;
00233 }
